title: NY Times Magazine - Type Time
content:
Maybe I’m the last kid on the block on this one, but congrats Tamye on your blurb in the ‘ [Type Casting](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127120723/http:/www.nytimes.com/2005/07/17/magazine/17CONSUMED.html)’ article in the _NY Times Magazine_ this weekend. It’s also good to see a great face like Bello get such good press.

Even the cover is typographic. Though, I question the font choice… { [the magazine online](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127120723/http:/nytimes.com/pages/magazine/index.html)} A JPEG of the cover is attached to this post.

comments.content: Thanks! It was so great to be part of talking type to the masses… the writer was so nice, and was happy to have the piece come out on the eve of Type Week!
